name: Datascape Savant - Laolao
text: If this card is in your hand: You can target 1 "Datascape" card you control; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Level/Rank 3 or higher monsters, also send 1 "Datascape" card from your Deck to the GY with a different card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) from the targeted card, and if you do, Special Summon this card, then you can Special Summon from your GY in Defense Position, 1 "Datascape" monster with a different name than the card you sent to the GY, but negate its effects. You can only use this effect of "Datascape Savant - Laolao" once per turn.
